title: lpjmlkit: Toolkit for basic LPJmL handling
description: A collection of base functions to facilitate the work with the Dynamic Global Vegetation Model (DGVM) Lund-Potsdam-Jena managed Land (LPJmL) hosted at the Potsdam Institute for Climate Impact Research (PIK). It provides functions for performing LPJmL simulations, as well as reading, processing and writing model-related data such as inputs and outputs or configuration files.
